item.title: Release always, even partial features
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Release always, even partial features Have you wondered what to do when a feature takes more time than the scheduled one? What can you do if you reach the deadline but the feature is incomplete? Introduction In this post I will tell an early in my career story when I first learned that the release of anything is always better than release nothing.
